verses.roman:
kali-kālera dharma--kṛṣṇa-nāma-saṅkīrtana
kṛṣṇa-śakti vinā nahe tāra pravartana

synonyms: kali-kālera—of this age of Kali; dharma—the duty; kṛṣṇa-nāma-saṅkīrtana—chanting the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa; kṛṣṇa-śakti vinā—without being empowered by Lord Kṛṣṇa; nahe—is not; tāra—of that; pravartana—propagation.
translation: "The fundamental religious system in the age of Kali is the chanting of the holy name of Kṛṣṇa. Unless empowered by Kṛṣṇa, one cannot propagate the saṅkīrtana movement.
